data.description: New home under construction being built by Mitchell Building Co., a local company with over 40 years experience. Mature subdivision with only a few lots left to build on. This home has an open floor plan with 9' ceilings, fireplace , granite kitchen, laminate flooring, quartz in baths, central A/C, energy seal package, 3 car garage, concrete drive and much more! Buy now and choose your own colors inside and out! Call Builder/agent for more information.
